MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CanMove As Boolean
public: property bool CanMove { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 項目是否可以移動。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element can be moved.

value.span: 如果項目可以移動，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the element can be moved; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件無法移動、 調整大小或旋轉，使其產生的畫面位置會完全超出其容器且無法存取以鍵盤或滑鼠座標。An object cannot be moved, resized or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 比方說，當最上層的視窗完全出螢幕外移，或子物件是容器的檢視區界限之外移動。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在這些情況下，物件會放置在接近所要求的螢幕座標被覆寫成容器範圍內的上方或左方座標。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自後續會用來移動和。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and subsequently used to move the . [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#103)]

summary.span: 取得的值指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]項目是否可調整大小。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element can be resized.

value.span: 如果項目可調整大小，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the element can be resized; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件無法移動、 調整大小或旋轉，使其產生的畫面位置會完全超出座標，其容器，而無法存取以鍵盤或滑鼠。An object cannot be moved, resized, or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 比方說，當最上層的視窗完全出螢幕外移，或子物件是容器的檢視區界限之外移動。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在這些情況下，物件會放置在接近所要求的螢幕座標被覆寫成容器範圍內的上方或左方座標。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自後續會用來調整大小和。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and subsequently used to resize the . [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#104)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件無法移動、 調整大小或旋轉，使其產生的畫面位置會完全超出座標，其容器，而無法存取以鍵盤或滑鼠。An object cannot be moved, resized, or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 比方說，當最上層的視窗完全出螢幕外移，或子物件是容器的檢視區界限之外移動。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在這些情況下，物件會放置在接近所要求的螢幕座標被覆寫成容器範圍內的上方或左方座標。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自和後續會用來旋轉。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and subsequently used to rotate the .
